sections.paragraph: வினைச்சொல் - கிரமமாய் வை,மதி, அடுக்கு, அடுக்கிவை, வரிசையாக வை, அணிவகு, ஆயத்தம்பண்ணு, ஆயத்தப் படுத்து, எரியவை, ஒப்பாயிரு, நிகராயிரு
(1) to arrange, to set or to put or to lay in order, to set in array, to prepare, to order, to ordain, to handle, to furnish, to esteem, to e qual, to direct, to compare
1) to arrange or to set or to lay in order, to arrange, to state in order, to set forth (a legal case), to set in place
Cognate: H4630, H4633, H4634, H4635, H6186, H6187
